executable.title: Model To LabelMap
executable.description: Intersects an input model with a reference volume and produces an output label map, filling voxels inside the model with the specified label value.
executable.contributor: Andras Lasso (PerkLab), Csaba Pinter (PerkLab), Nicole Aucoin (SPL, BWH), Xiaodong Tao (GE)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

integer.name: labelValue
integer.description: The unsigned char label value to use in the output label map.
integer.label: Label value

image.name: InputVolume
image.label: Input Volume
image.description: Output volume will have the same origin, spacing, axis directions, and extent as this volume.
